sentences.en: ...a skinny, effeminate guy in lipstick and earrings.
sentences.cn: ...一个抹口红、戴耳环，骨瘦如柴的娘娘腔男人。

sentences.en: Also, he had effeminate voice and faces too.
sentences.cn: 同时, 他也表现出了抚媚的嗓音和表情.

sentences.en: Contrary to his effeminate appearance, he said without reserve during interview.
sentences.cn: 相对于他的优柔寡断, 在访谈过程中他毫无保留.

sentences.en: He is an effeminate country youngster with watery blue eyes and hair parted in the middle.
sentences.cn: 他是个性格柔弱,有着水汪汪的蓝眼睛,并且头发分成中界的乡村青年.

sentences.en: He spoke in an effeminate voice.
sentences.cn: 他讲起话来一副娘娘腔.

sentences.en: His voice was curiously high-pitched, reedy, almost effeminate.
sentences.cn: 他的嗓音出奇地高，尖声尖气，有些娘娘腔。

sentences.en: It will not effeminate the boy's mind.
sentences.cn: 它不会使这男孩的心灵柔弱.

sentences.en: Just began, 3 suspects rob the vanity of effeminate woman technically, procurable hind sneak away.
sentences.cn: 刚开始, 三名疑犯专门抢劫柔弱女子的手袋, 得手后就溜之大吉.

sentences.en: See the handsome but effeminate young man; he has no virile character.
sentences.cn: 瞧这个奶油小生, 哪有一点儿男子汉的气概啊?

sentences.en: Some times. but also can be very effeminate.
sentences.cn: 有的时候. 但也是很柔弱的.

sentences.en: Will he look much or a bit effeminate?
sentences.cn: 他应该看起来非常或者有些柔弱还是强壮?

words.tran_cn: 使柔弱（等于effeminate）；使无男子汉气概
使柔弱；使无男子汉气概

trans.tran_en: a man who is effeminate looks or behaves like a woman

trans.tran_cn: 变得无男子汉气概；变得柔弱
使柔弱；使无男子汉气概
